suncertify.db
Interface EngineService

All Known Implementing Classes:
EngineServiceImpl
public interface EngineService

Defines a service for creating DB engines for local database files, references for remote DB engines, and engines network services.

Creating multiple or single instance(s) for a database engine is an implementation specific behavior as long as the consistency of data is maintained correctly.

Author:
Mohammad S. Abdellatif
See Also:
EngineServiceLoader, Engine

Method Summary
 NetworkService createNetworkService(java.io.File dbFile, java.lang.String serviceName, int port)
          Creates an engine network service with name serviceName for database file dbFile listening on port port.

Method Detail

getEngine

Engine getEngine(java.io.File dbFile)
                 throws EngineServiceException
Creates an engine for database file dbFile.

Returns a new engine for database file dbFile or cached one if already created. It is up to provider implementation to control the number of instances created for same database file as long as the consistency of data is maintained correctly.

Parameters:
dbFile - database file reference.
Returns:
engine for database file.
Throws:
EngineServiceException - if creation for engine is failed.

getEngine

Engine getEngine(java.lang.String host,
                 int port,
                 java.lang.String serviceName)
                 throws EngineServiceException
Creates a reference for a remote engine with unique name serviceName listening on port port hosted on host.

Parameters:
host - host name which remote engine service is working on.
port - remote engine service listing port.
serviceName - unique service name for remote engine service.
Returns:
reference for a remote engine service.
Throws:
EngineServiceException - if getting for a reference is failed.

createNetworkService

NetworkService createNetworkService(java.io.File dbFile,
                                    java.lang.String serviceName,
                                    int port)
                                    throws EngineServiceException
Creates an engine network service with name serviceName for database file dbFile listening on port port.

Parameters:
dbFile - database file for which to start network service.
serviceName - network service name to be exported with.
port - listening port for network service.
Returns:
a database network service.
Throws:
EngineServiceException - if creating for network service is failed.
